task.title: Creating Your First Related Topics Links

step.cmd: Find the DITA map Exploring-ePublisher.ditamap in the ePublisher Express Document Manager.
Right click on the Exploring-ePublisher.ditamap and select Explore Location.
Open the DITA file t_create_your_fist_related_topics_links.xml in your preferred editing tool.
Apply the RelatedTopic paragraph style to the list of cross references inserted at the end of this section using the outputclass attribute.
Verify that this topic now displays a related topics section at the bottom of the topic in the generated output.
Return to the ePublisher Express Trial Guide to continue.
